<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/container-svc/logs"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



List Container logs.

Requires the `container-svc:log:view` permission.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"containerId":{"type":"string"},"limit":{"type":"integer"},"nodeId":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object"}}},"description":"List Logs Request","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
